Reviews.Title: This is phone exceeded my expectations
Reviews.Author: Grace
Reviews.Content: I love this phone!! It reminds me of the HTC Hero. This was a wonderful investment. My only complaint is the memory and how small it is. It slips from my hand so easily.

Reviews.Title: fast
Reviews.Author: tekco
Reviews.Content: very fast in the cell phone was exactly what I thought it would be works great brand new in the box thank you very much..

Reviews.Title: Would recommend.
Reviews.Author: K.J. Bryniarski
Reviews.Content: Works well enough to meet my needs. Would recommend to anyone who wants a reasonably priced smart phone. Battery seems to hold a charge for length of time indicated.

Reviews.Title: plus
Reviews.Author: Rocs
Reviews.Content: Good phone works well good price came quick easy to use great gift could noy ask for better deal. Plus

Reviews.Title: Good for a child
Reviews.Author: keuna turman
Reviews.Content: It was fine for a little child but for an adult the phone was to small, otherwise the phone was great. The only reason I returned it was because of the size.

Reviews.Title: Not expected
Reviews.Author: Giselda salinas
Reviews.Content: Too small the size of your palm , it's kind of slow sometimes if I could I would buy a much better phone

Reviews.Title: sucksss
Reviews.Author: tylar andrews
Reviews.Content: great phone at the start. after about three months its trash!!! me and my mom both have the same phone but she uses hers maybe twice a day and to call doctors. me on the other hand use it all the time and we still have the same issuses! it freezes all the time. no space at all. sometimes it just decideds not to ring! I hate it.

Reviews.Title: T-Mobile HTC Wildfire S Mobile Phone
Reviews.Author: SFP
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my grandson for Christmas.  I am a bit dissatisfied to know that the battery life of the phone is very poor!

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Deb S
Reviews.Content: Great phone. Got here faster than we expected. It was for son. He dropped. It on his shoe and ended up with a crack on the screen.

Reviews.Title: unacceptable
Reviews.Author: krikit v mcnair
Reviews.Content: Sent this phone screen blacks out as well  no sd card will read in phone battery overheats got it as apresent for someone not impressed

ProductInfo.Features:
"Replacement Device" "No Contract Changes"
3G Capable: Quickly connect to the Internet via 3G anywhere within the T-Mobile USA 3G network
5 Megapixel Camera: With quality worth printing, now you can really enjoy those special moments captured on your device. You can also share them with family and friends by sending them to any e-mail address, T-Mobile camera phone, or MyAlbum
Messaging [Text, Picture & Social Networking]: Send a message or a photo to any wireless phone or e-mail address. Or stay connected using always-on social networking
3.5mm Audio Jack: 3.5mm audio jack gives you the flexibility to listen to your downloaded tunes just about anywhere-all you need is a standard set of ear buds or headphones
ProductInfo.Name: T-Mobile HTC Wildfire S Mobile Phone, 5.0 MP Camera, Bluetooth, White
